page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = SQL_TableInfoOfDBF(* Name_or_pointer ,& TableInfoResult )

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

argument.name: Name_or_pointer
argument.description: The path to and name of an Alpha Anywhere table.

argument.name: TableInfoResult
argument.description: A SQL::TableInfo object that records the properties of the named table.

page.description: Create a SQL table definition from a DBF file, or an open table pointer.
page.discussion: The SQL_TableInfoOfDBF() function creates a SQL::TableInfo object based on a local Alpha Anywhere .DBF table. This function is a wrapper for A5_SQL_TableInfo_of_DBF().
page.example: dim ti as SQL::tableinfo ? SQL_TableInfoOfDBF("c:\databases\alphasports\product.dbf", ti) = .T. ? ti = +Column. Comment = "" DBFRowSyntax = PRODUCT_ID,C,12,0 DESCRIPTION,C,32,0 COST,N,7,2 RETAIL,N,7,2 RE_ORDER,N,4,0 VENDOR,C,5,0 QTY_IN_STO,N,6,0 +Index. Name = "c:\databases\alphasports\product.dbf" NativeAPI = "DBF" NativeSyntax = "DBF" Owner = "" TableType = 0 TableTypeName = "Table" Updateable = .T.
